name: nativescript-urlhandler
description: Register custom URLs for your NativeScript app

scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules hooks platforms target '*.js' '*.js.map' 'sampleApp/**/*.js' 'sampleApp/**/*.js.map' sampleApp/platforms sampleApp/node_modules sampleApp/hooks
scripts.postclean: npm i && cd sampleApp && npm i
scripts.test: npm run tslint && npm run jasmine
scripts.e2e: npm run preparedemo && cd sampleApp && tns build ios && tns build android
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd sampleApp && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd sampleApp && tns run android --emulator
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd sampleApp && tns plugin remove nativescript-urlhandler && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.changelog:add: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release:pre: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.release:post: npm run changelog && npm run changelog:add
scripts.release:major: npm run release:pre && npm version major && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run publish-and-merge
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:pre && npm version minor && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run publish-and-merge
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:pre && npm version patch && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run publish-and-merge
scripts.publish-and-merge: git checkout master && git merge develop && git push && git checkout develop && npm publish

author: Martin Reinhardt
